product_name: The North Face Zephyrus Optimus Hoodie Jacket - Men's
long_description: Super lightweight, super warm and super compressible, The North Face Zephyrus Optimus hoodie is an essential alpine tool for layering or aerobic summit pushes. Insulated with 100g of PrimaLoft(R) One, which has an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio. PrimaLoft(R) One patented microfiber insulation mimics the physical and thermal properties of goose down, but continues to insulate if wet. Hood, shoulders and sleeves are made of durable Pertex(R) Endurance ripstop nylon with a polyurethane coating to increase water resistance. The North Face Zephyrus Optimus hoodie also features stretch cuffs to seal in warmth and two zippered hand pockets.
short_description: Super lightweight, super warm and super compressible, The North Face Zephyrus Optimus hoodie is an essential alpine tool for layering or aerobic summit pushes.
